entities.description: A disorder related to the misuse of substances such as stimulants and sedatives.
Indicates whether the respondent used stimulants in the past 12 months.
Usage of prescription sedatives over the past 12 months.
The effect or feeling experienced due to using prescription sedatives.
Effort spent in attempting to get prescription sedatives.
Instances where prescription sedatives were used in larger amounts or longer than intended.
The respondent's answer to the survey question.

relationships.description: Relates substance use disorder to the use of stimulants in the past 12 months.
Relates substance use disorder to the use of prescription sedatives in the past 12 months.
Relates prescription sedative use to the effects or feelings experienced while using them.
Relates prescription sedative use to the effort spent in attempting to obtain them.
Relates prescription sedative use to instances where sedatives were overused.
Relates the respondent to their answer to the survey question.

triplets.subject: Respondent
triplets.object: get over/avoid stimulant withdrawal in past 12 months

triplets.subject: Respondent
triplets.object: feel effects of prescription sedatives in past 12 months

triplets.subject: Respondent
triplets.object: trying to get prescription sedatives in past 12 months

triplets.subject: Respondent
triplets.object: in larger amounts or for longer time than intended in past 12 months
